about_the_game:
Poco's Magical Creature Camp

The story begins in a peaceful world reborn after its end. Poco is a human dandelion, awaken from a deep slumber by a mysterious visitor. Guided by curiosity, Poco starts a journey to connect with others and understand the world. Explore and discover a new world with Poco!

Poco's Six Emotions(Coming soon)

While Poco is equipped with basic knowledge, such as how to walk and speak, they don't know how to feel or express emotions. View the unfamiliar world through Poco's eyes as they explore hidden puzzles to acquire "Emotion Fragments" and broaden their horizons through exploration.

Unique Camping Lifestyle

The journey of life is a continuous dialogue between the 'external world' and 'myself.' This process is approached through unique camping experiences, embracing nature in a primal way without the use of special equipment.

  • Bartering (Shop)
    Pursue mutual prosperity through bartering with novice merchants. Obtain materials that are difficult to gather on your own through interactions with the merchant 'Big Hand'!*

  • Cooking
    Prepare meals using ingredients acquired through gathering and bartering. Use the completed dishes to extend your awakening time!
